name: SUPERPOPULAR
description:
SUPERPOPULAR is an incremental game that lets you explore the wild and shallow life of an online personality.

Brand yourself online and become an important influencer.

Perform increasingly moronic tasks in order to avoid being sorted out by an algorithm and disappear into irrelevance.
Rake up those likes and get the sweet validation your stepfather was never able to give you no matter how hard he tried.
Increase your audience by taking borderline pornographic pictures and performing dangerous stunts.
Work hard to impress people you have never met in order to score a sponsorship deal that pays in coupons.
Experience the excitement that comes with building a livelyhood on online fame.

Will your account be suspended for a 10 year old tweet?
Will everything you worked for disappear over night? You never know!

Get in on the action and compete with others for the most likes in an utterly meaningless battle for "exposure", just like in real life! Want to experience what it's like to be an online influencer with a massive following?
Then SUPERPOPULAR is the game you have been waiting for.
